channel.title: Super Sound Studios - Podcast- "TERROR OF THE ARCTIC" - 8 Part Audio Drama
channel.description:
TERROR OF THE ARCTIC- After receiving a distress signal from a dimensional void, The Doctor and Christine are lead to the 19th Century Arctic where they become involved in one of history's greatest unsolved mysteries. They soon discover a pair of British sailing vessels trapped in the ice. The crews are dying one by one despite the fact that the crewmen are healthy and have an abundance of supplies, shelter and food. The Doctor, perplexed by the unexplained deaths as well as the distress signal, pledges his aid. Unfortunately the crews do not trust The Doctor and Christine and suspect they are behind the mysterious deaths. Their case is not aided when they are found standing over the body of a crewman. The situation worsens with disappearances, time disruptions, and a hunt across a barren wasteland. Then they discover the real trouble. The Doctor and Christine must save themselves and the crews, but history is working against them. The year is 1848, this is Sir John Franklin's expedition to discover the Northwest Passage and there were no survivors. Can the Doctor rescue the expedition without destroying the time stream of history?
www.supersoundstudios.com www.wnar-am.com 3:30 AM Daily Eastern Time
channel.itunes:subtitle: www.supersoundstudios.com
channel.itunes:author: Richard Franklin

item.title: "TERROR OF THE ARCTIC"-Trailer
item.description: Preview of "TERROR OF THE ARCTIC" mystery, sci-fi, horror, adventure, audio drama.
item.dc:creator: Richard Franklin
item.itunes:summary: Preview of "TERROR OF THE ARCTIC" mystery, sci-fi, horror, adventure, audio drama.

item.title: TERROR OF THE ARCTIC-Episode 8-Copyright2005R.Franklin
item.description: Conclusion: Can the Doctor finally stop the T' Plex before they are all free or will they continue their killing spree? History tells us there were no survivors!
item.dc:creator: Richard Franklin
item.itunes:summary: Conclusion: Can the Doctor finally stop the T' Plex before they are all free or will they continue their killing spree? History tells us there were no survivors!

item.title: TERROR OF THE ARCTIC-Episode 7-Copyright2005R.Franklin
item.description: Another traitor stands revealed! And the Doctor confronts the Matriarx of the T' Plex in the heart of their ship!
item.dc:creator: Richard Franklin
item.itunes:summary: Another traitor stands revealed! And the Doctor confronts the Matriarx of the T' Plex in the heart of their ship!

item.title: TERROR OF THE ARCTIC-Episode 6-Copyright2005R.Franklin
item.description: Who murdered Hopcraft? Hint-No he didn't. The Doctor and Christine battle the killer in their midst! The T' Plex catch up with the crew for lunch!
item.dc:creator: Richard Franklin
item.itunes:summary: Who murdered Hopcraft? Hint-No he didn't. The Doctor and Christine battle the killer in their midst! The T' Plex catch up with the crew for lunch!

item.title: TERROR OF THE ARCTIC-Episode 5-Copyright2005R.Franklin
item.description: Murder and mutiny among the intrepid explorers complicate efforts to defeat determined cyborg predators.
item.dc:creator: Richard Franklin
item.itunes:summary: Murder and mutiny among the intrepid explorers complicate efforts to defeat determined cyborg predators.

item.title: TERROR OF THE ARCTIC-Episode 4-Copyright2005R.Franklin
item.description: Alien creatures plot the domination of Earth and the Doctor's demise. Relationships form, trust and alliances build among the stranded explorers. The Doctor identifies the problem, and diagnoses what's been eating them lately.
item.dc:creator: Richard Franklin
item.itunes:summary: Alien creatures plot the domination of Earth and the Doctor's demise. Relationships form, trust and alliances build among the stranded explorers. The Doctor identifies the problem, and diagnoses what's been eating them lately.

item.title: TERROR OF THE ARCTIC-Episode 3-Copyright2005R.Franklin
item.description: Time and space disturbances disrupt the expedition as vicious creatures attack. The strange, gruesome, murders and disapperances continue. Discovery of missing communication device delights the Doctor, almost as much as the disappearance of his dimensionally transcendental blue box disappoints, leaving no way out.
item.dc:creator: Richard Franklin
item.itunes:summary: Time and space disturbances disrupt the expedition as vicious creatures attack. The strange, gruesome, murders and disapperances continue. Discovery of missing communication device delights the Doctor, almost as much as the disappearance of his dimensionally transcendental blue box disappoints, leaving no way out.

item.title: TERROR OF THE ARCTIC-Episode 2-Copyright 2005 R. Franklin
item.description: The Doctor and Christine find themselves with the crews of the lost 1847 -1848 Sir John Franklin Arctic Expedition to find the Northwest Passage. The Doctor is accused of a series of grusome murders. But the real problem is-THERE WERE NO SURVIVORS. Can the Doctor and Christine escape? Can they save the others? Stay tuned for more. Link to backround information: http://www.coolantarctica.com/Antarctica%20fact%20file/History/antarctic_ships/erebus_terror_Franklin.htm

item.title: Episode 1-THE DOCTOR ARRIVES!
item.description: The doctor responds to a strange inter-dimensional distress call, only to find he faces a terrifying challenge. Can he save the crew of a doomed 1848 expedition to find the Northwest Passage without destroying history and changing world events? THIS SERIES IS ALSO BROADCAST ON - WWW.WNAR-AM.COM 3:30 AM Daily, Eastern Time

item.title: Doctor Who - Terror of the Arctic - Preview
item.description: NEW DOCTOR WHO STORY PREVIEW-TERROR OF THE ARCTIC The doctor is in! Mystery of the lost Franklin Arctic expedition, in 8 parts. Terror of the Arctic After receiving a distress signal from a dimensional void, The Doctor and Christine are lead to the 19th Century Arctic where they become involved in one of history's great unsolved mysteries. They soon discover a pair of British sailing vessels trapped in the ice. The crews are dying one by one despite the fact that the crewmen are healthy and have an abundance of supplies, shelter and food. The Doctor, perplexed by the unexplained deaths as well as the distress signal, pledges his aid. Unfortunately the crews do not trust The Doctor and Christine and suspect they are behind the mysterious deaths. Their case is not aided when they are found standing over the body of a crewman. The situation worsens with disappearances, time disruptions, and a hunt across a barren wasteland. Then they discover the real trouble. The Doctor and Christine must save themselves and the crews, but history is working against them. The year is 1848, this is Sir John Franklin's expedition to discover the Northwest Passage and there were no survivors. item.title: FREE TELEPHONE MUSIC/MESSAGE ON HOLD ANNOUNCEMENT-WWW.SUPERSOUNDSTUDIOS.COM
item.description: This music/message on hold audio file (MOH) is distributed FREE to show how callers can be entertained and informed while placed on hold from your (or other) business telephone. Custom messages and music are also available for your business, or to promote and inform. Some suggested uses: Health Care-hours, health information, reminders, services, directions, instructions, etc. Realtors-Listings, services, locations, open house directions, office hours, financing, rentals, agents, and more. Retail, dealerships, and Shopping-backround music, sales promotions, locations, hours, product descriptions, specials, Holiday music, greetings, credit info., and more. MESSAGES CAN BE BROADCAST, AT VARIOUS LOCATIONS, OVER THE RADIO 24 HOURS A DAY! CONTACT US FOR DETAILS! supersoundstudios@yahoo.com FOR ALL BUSINESS TELEPHONE NEEDS CONTACT: WWW.DATALABS.NET
